verses.name: Job 10:12
verses.text: Thou hast granted me life and favour, and thy visitation hath preserved my spirit.

verses.name: Job 10:13
verses.text: And these things hast thou hid in thine heart: I know that this is with thee.

verses.name: Job 10:14
verses.text: If I sin, then thou markest me, and thou wilt not acquit me from mine iniquity.

verses.name: Job 10:15
verses.text: If I be wicked, woe unto me; and if I be righteous, yet will I not lift up my head. I am full of confusion; therefore see thou mine affliction;

verses.name: Job 10:16
verses.text: For it increaseth. Thou huntest me as a fierce lion: and again thou shewest thyself marvellous upon me.
